name: Rogue Like Adventure
description:
A game I made following the Unity tutorial below.

https://learn.unity.com/project/2d-roguelike-tutorial

I made a few modifications to the movement, enemy A.I and added an extra sound effect. Was great fun and learnt a lot.

Use W AS D to move, make it to the exit to advance  and when food runs out it is game over. 

Enjoy.
